doc:
Joe Spinell https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joe_Spinell 0 Joe Spinell (born Joseph J. Spagnuolo; October 28, 1936 – January 13, 1989) was an American character actor who appeared in numerous films in the 1970s and 1980s, as well as various stage productions on and off Broadway.His notable roles included performances in The Godfather (1972) and The Godfather Part II (1974), Rocky (1976) and Rocky II (1979), Taxi Driver (1976), Sorcerer (1977), Cruising (1980), and many more. He was a recurring actor in early Sylvester Stallone films. Most his career consists of him playing bit to major supporting roles, many of them villainous, in major and small American films. Spinell became a figure in the Cult film genre, due to many appearances them, and his only three leading roles in horror films. Actress Caroline Munro, with whom he shared the screen three times, was his co lead in two of them. The first one was the psychological slasher film Maniac (1980), which he also wrote. The second one was The Last Horror Film a horror comedy film. The third was The Undertaker a slasher film released posthumously. Joe_Spinell ( born Joseph_J._Spagnuolo ; October_28_,_1936 – January_13_,_1989 ) was an_American_character_actor who appeared in numerous_films in the_1970s_and_1980s , as_well_as various_stage_productions on_and_off Broadway.His_notable_roles included performances in The_Godfather ( 1972 ) and The_Godfather_Part_II ( 1974 ) , Rocky ( 1976 ) and Rocky_II ( 1979 ) ,_Taxi_Driver ( 1976 ) , Sorcerer ( 1977 ) , Cruising ( 1980 ) , and many_more . He was a_recurring_actor in early_Sylvester_Stallone_films . Most his_career consists of him playing bit to major_supporting_roles , many of them villainous , in major_and_small_American_films . Spinell became a_figure in the_Cult_film_genre , due to many_appearances them , and his_only_three_leading_roles in horror_films . Actress_Caroline_Munro , with whom he shared the_screen three_times , was his_co_lead in two of them . The_first_one was the_psychological_slasher_film_Maniac_(_1980_) , which he also wrote . The_second_one was The_Last_Horror_Film a_horror_comedy_film . The_third was The_Undertaker a_slasher_film released posthumously .
